encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - I agree with Sampson about the end of line 3. I suggest adding θεός without the nomen sacrum marks as an alt reading. In addition to this, note Sampson's requested changes.
Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - I agree with Sampson about the end of line 3. I suggest adding θεός without the nomen sacrum marks as an alt reading. In addition to this, note Sampson's requested changes.

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Well done. The corrections on r.6 and 7 are well spotted, but I would like a second vote on the one in r.3 (it makes sense, but θεός is nowhere else in the text written as a nomen sacrum). Please also note Paul’s requests about the dot and supraline which need to be added in the xml (not possible in Leiden+) in finalization. Please correct te > the in the commentary to r.8. META: Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575).

Vote - Accept-Text-Meta - Well done. The corrections on r.6 and 7 are well spotted, but I would like a second vote on the one in r.3 (it makes sense, but θεός is nowhere else in the text written as a nomen sacrum). Please also note Paul’s requests about the dot and supraline which need to be added in the xml (not possible in Leiden+) in finalization. Please correct te > the in the commentary to r.8. META: Hermopolis is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756574); Hermopolites is Pleiades georef (https://pleiades.stoa.org/places/756575).
